text: ‘Athaba tomara ekati sonara tairi ghara habe athaba tumi akase arohana karabe, kintu tomara akasa arohane amara kakhano imana anabo na yataksana tumi amadera prati eka kitaba nayila na karabe ya amara patha karaba [1].’ Baluna, ‘pabitra mahana amara raba! Ami to hacchi sudhu ekajana manusera rasula [2].’
